Appel a contribution XXVI International Conference on Source Studies and Historiography of Asia and Africa 'Asian and African Studies in the Dialogue of Civilizations'
The Faculty of Asian and African Studies of the Saint Petersburg State University
The Faculty of Asian and African Studies of the Saint Petersburg State University
the XXVI International Conference on Source Studies and Historiography
of Asia and Africa «Asian and African Studies in the Dialogue of Civilizations»,
which will take place in St. Petersburg
5. Historiography of India and Southeast Asia.
7. Historiography of Mongolia, Tibet and Buddhism.
13. Literature of Asia and Africa in the Development of World Literature.
14. Section of Young Scholars in Asian and African Studies.
Working languages of the Conference: Russian and English.
Time for presentation of papers: 20 minutes including discussion.

Deadline for submission of abstracts: 31 January 2011. The abstracts should not exceed 1 page (300 words) and should be submitted to the Organizing Committee in electronic form (as MS Word 1997-2003 document) by e-mail:
We regret to inform that the Organising Committee cannot cover the costs of your tickets and accommodation; however, the Organizing Committee can help in arranging accommodation in St. Petersburg.
